records.Name: Code and Blockquotes
records.Content__c:
Code Examples

Inline code: const greeting = "Hello World";

function calculateTotal(items) {
    return items
        .filter(item => item.active)
        .map(item => item.price * item.quantity)
        .reduce((sum, val) => sum + val, 0);
}
